reviews.review: this is the best game ever!!!!!!!! :)

This is a very very good fps shooter with a very good and immersive story and could be called the best.
Well the best series of fps shooters as the next games are also just as good.
Thank you VALVE. Thank you Sierra!

Jugu√© Half-Life por primera vez a mediados de la d√©cada del 2000. Qui√©n dir√≠a que el juego que alguna vez revolvi√≥ el est√≥mago gan√≥ m√°s de 50 premios GOTY, y ciertamente no sin raz√≥n. Half-Life no solo fue un juego bien desarrollado para su √©poca, dejando un legado para muchos futuros FPS, sino que tambi√©n tiene una historia llena de suspenso y un gameplay de mucha acci√≥n y retos. Por supuesto que la historia se pone mucho mejor con las secuelas, pero no es mala por s√≠ misma.

Aunque se pueda pensar al principio que los gr√°ficos de Half-Life son simples o sin gracia, hay que tener en cuenta que el motor del juego es una reconversi√≥n del que ten√≠a Quake. Por esa raz√≥n, la gr√°fica es bastante similar a grandes rasgos, pero el contraste entre cient√≠ficos, militares y aliens en un entorno que equilibra laboratorios, oficinas, zonas peligrosas, desiertos, bodegas, etc. evocan bastante fielmente la idea de una instalaci√≥n cient√≠fica-militar secreta escondida en New Mexico. Cada enemigo tiene su aspecto especial que le da ventajas y puntos d√©biles, aportando a un gameplay redondo en cuanto a dificultad.

La historia es enigm√°tica y mientras m√°s avanzas quedas con m√°s preguntas que respuestas, pero por esta misma raz√≥n me pareci√≥n interesante. Como una novela de misterio, tienes que poner las piezas en su lugar a medida que avanza la historia e ir m√°s all√° de lo superficial. Adem√°s, en t√©rminos generales la narrativa calza bien con los puzzles y retos que te vas encontrando. Admito que hay personajes y escenas que parecen fuera de lugar incluso luego de terminar el juego, pero justo eso es lo que m√°s me dej√≥ enganchado de la historia.

El gameplay tiene todo lo que un FPS puede ofrecer. Aunque la IA tiene algunos bugs que a veces arruinan la experiencia, se desbloquean cada vez m√°s armas mientras avanzas, con un poder de fuego que se adapta a los enemigos cada vez m√°s dif√≠ciles. Dir√≠a que el aspecto m√°s distintivo de Half-Life son los puzzles, que no son tan comunes en otros FPS de acci√≥n. Estos requieren algo de ingenio y comprensi√≥n del movimiento avanzado (salto+agacharse), as√≠ como tambi√©n c√°lculo. Y es eso justamente lo que hace mejor a este juego frente a otros FPS que son solo correr y disparar a todo lo que se mueva. Una gracia importante del motor de juego es su facilidad para la programaci√≥n, por lo que no es dif√≠cil encontrar varios y buenos mods que vale la pena probar.

Sin miedo a equivocarme, dir√≠a que Half-Life es un cl√°sico en el m√°s estricto sentido: un juego que a todo a quien le guste los FPS de acci√≥n tiene que probar, no solo por lo que tiene sino que tambi√©n por su influencia sobre otros FPS m√°s nuevos. Tambi√©n por su historia, que deja tantas preguntas sin responder incluso con 3 secuelas. Si est√°s buscando un shooter que vaya m√°s all√° de lo b√°sico, este definitivamente es para ti.

Great story environment, with rich gameplay, beautiful level design, amazing music, and a progression that makes you feel like you're doing something other than just looking for a keycard to a door.
You can get a masterpiece at a very cheap price on sales (only 0.81 cents!). Its a classic that you must play.
Beside Doom, this is another Legendary game, it's really old though and it means their Graphic could be bad, you can try Black Mesa for a heavily remake of Half Life
its a classic that stardid it all
An absolute classic, I personally prefer HL2 but this game is still really good.
Great game, would recommend to anyone when it is on sale like right now, currently 71p. You can't go wrong at that price.
This game has an action-packed campaign that will have you at your edge of your seat.

Best game, 10/10, but it will guarantee to have nightmares about you being the protagonist of this game, and you will have a hard time to sleep during the night because you will imagine there's a headcrab in your bed or in your closet.

By the way, the barnacles are scary as hell it will scare you when you get grabbed by the tongue be careful around any ceiling you come across, it will guarantee you a barnacle.

That's all i will write in this review, its a top notch game would recommend it to you, and if you completed it already check out the mods for this game its great!

Finally played this game. The graphics are a little annoying at first but when you get immerse in the game you don't care about the graphics. The game is very good and it's kinda little hard? I played on normal difficulty but still was a little too hard for a "normal". I saw a video of the full gameplay and it was 4 hours and I thought ok I'm gonna finish it in a go but nope! don't know how did that guy finished it in 4 hours cause the game is quite long. Also the game doesn't show or tell you what to do and where to go especially the later missions and it's kinda hard to figure out but thank god for Youtube amitire?
It's from 21 years ago so I wasn't expecting much but I got surprised a lot throughout the game cuz I can't believe how everyone felt playing this game in 98 so I get all the praise the game gets and I think it totally deserves them. So play it if you haven't already it is a really good game.

Playing HL in Virtual Reality using Lambda1VR makes this game even better. Maybe the best game you can now play on the Oculus Quest! If you have a Quest - try it!
Make sure you stick to the guide reddit  r/Lambda1VR. The community there is friendly and will help you if you get stuck.

Half-Life, un grandissimo classico e uno dei capisaldi degli FPS.
Bellissimo gioco, l'ho recuperato di recente per il prezzo assurdo (80 centesimi!), alcune sezioni sono invecchiate maluccio e ho faticato parecchio a superarle ma in generale rimane un titolone anche nel 2019.

The one that started it all.

The atomosphere is unique, the enemy AI is challenging, the story is great and the game is pretty much perfect.

This game changed the gaming world as we know it and gave origin to some of the most well known games out there like Counter-Strike, Team Fortress 2, etc.

For this reasons a have to give this game a score of 10/10. You have to play it at least once in your life.
fun game, but has definitely aged over time, decent gameplay good story

Un CLASICO los controles son de la epoca pero son la base que se usa hasta el dia de Hoy no voy a decir que la historia es mala pero diria que faltan personajes siento que estoy solo en el juego te mandan de un lado a otro sin ton ni son pero es sumamente entretenido los escenarios son geniales y el final es genial el boss es un poco malo pero pasable un juego que debes jugar antes de morir
